item.title: Circular Progress Indicator in Swift
item.description: Updated on April 17, 2017 – Swift 3 Circular progress indicators are a nice and compact way to visualize progress information for users of your iOS app. I was extremely grateful to come across Kaan Dedeoglu’s KDCircularProgress project on GitHub. It’s a versatile little UI component written in Swift that provides a great amount of flexibility and customization options. I love it! As a bonus to this amazing component, recent contributions by Kaan have opened up the ability for us to lay out and set up the circular progress indicator in the Storyboard!
